allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: PDF24 Batch OCR Processor

Features:
- Parallel OCR processing using PDF24
- Crash recovery with auto-start on boot
- Persistent settings saved to JSON
- Real-time progress tracking
- Continuous mode for new files
- Windows service support via NSSM
- 3-day log rotation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
